quote_first: Mr Green left for work at a
quote_last: , as he did every morning. He walked down his front steps carrying his empty-looking leatherette briefcase with the noisy silver clasps, opened his car door, and ducked his head to climb into the driver's seat.
title: A Crime in The Neighborhood
author: Suzanne Berne
